class.name: GDNetworkTable
class.brief_description: Interface for the WPILib Network Table system
class.description: This class provides a way to communicate with a WPILib robot program, primarily designed for use with the XRP system. With current design, this only accesses a Network Table at [code]{localhost}[/code], and with the table name [code]{datatable}[/code]

method.name: fetch_double
method.description: Returns the the double stored in field [code]{name}[/code]

method.name: fetch_int
method.description: Returns the the integer stored in field [code]{name}[/code]

method.name: fetch_string
method.description: Returns the the string stored in field [code]{name}[/code]

member.name: entrylist
member.description: A list of all fields that will be accessed from this node.
